    Field
    Description
    final Map<CPGClass.Attribute,AttributeStat>
    attributeStats
    A map containing all the attribute stats of a given class
    final Map<String,Integer>
    classLineMap
    A detailed overview indicating how totalClassLines was determined showing how many lines were associated with attributes, methods, class declaration, and all nested classes
    final int
    classUsage
    The total number of times this class was used within cpg

    cpgClass
    The reference to the class that this ClassStat is providing statistics on

    methodStats
    A map containing all the method stats of a given class
    final Map<CPGClass.Modifier,List<CPGClass.Attribute>>
    modifierGroupedAttributes
    Groups all the attributes of a given class by "PUBLIC", "PROTECTED", "PRIVATE" and "PACKAGE PRIVATE" modifiers.
    final Map<CPGClass.Modifier,List<CPGClass.Method>>
    modifierGroupedMethods
    Groups all the methods of a given class by "PUBLIC", "PROTECTED", "PRIVATE" and "PACKAGE PRIVATE" modifiers.
    final Map<CPGClass,Integer>
    totalClassAttributeCalls
    The total distinct attribute calls that this class makes to other classes (including itself) via its methods.
    final int
    totalClassLines
    The total number of non-empty lines present within a file (excludes package and import statements)
    final Map<CPGClass,Integer>
    totalClassMethodCalls
    The total distinct method calls that this class makes to other classes (including itself) via its methods.
    final Map<String,Integer>
    usageMap
    A detailed overview indicating how the classUsage was determined by showing how many times a class was used as a parameter type, inheritance or realization relation target, how many times it was used as an attribute type, and how many times its attributes and methods were called

  • Field Details

    • cpgClass

      public final CPGClass cpgClass
      The reference to the class that this ClassStat is providing statistics on

    • attributeStats

      public final Map<CPGClass.Attribute,AttributeStat> attributeStats
      A map containing all the attribute stats of a given class

    • methodStats

      public final Map<CPGClass.Method,MethodStat> methodStats
      A map containing all the method stats of a given class

    • classUsage

      public final int classUsage
      The total number of times this class was used within cpg

    • usageMap

      public final Map<String,Integer> usageMap
      A detailed overview indicating how the classUsage was determined by showing how many times a class was used as a parameter type, inheritance or realization relation target, how many times it was used as an attribute type, and how many times its attributes and methods were called

    • totalClassLines

      public final int totalClassLines
      The total number of non-empty lines present within a file (excludes package and import statements)

    • classLineMap

      public final Map<String,Integer> classLineMap
      A detailed overview indicating how totalClassLines was determined showing how many lines were associated with attributes, methods, class declaration, and all nested classes

    • modifierGroupedAttributes

      public final Map<CPGClass.Modifier,List<CPGClass.Attribute>> modifierGroupedAttributes
      Groups all the attributes of a given class by "PUBLIC", "PROTECTED", "PRIVATE" and "PACKAGE PRIVATE" modifiers.

    • modifierGroupedMethods

      public final Map<CPGClass.Modifier,List<CPGClass.Method>> modifierGroupedMethods
      Groups all the methods of a given class by "PUBLIC", "PROTECTED", "PRIVATE" and "PACKAGE PRIVATE" modifiers.

    • totalClassAttributeCalls

      public final Map<CPGClass,Integer> totalClassAttributeCalls
      The total distinct attribute calls that this class makes to other classes (including itself) via its methods.

    • totalClassMethodCalls

      public final Map<CPGClass,Integer> totalClassMethodCalls
      The total distinct method calls that this class makes to other classes (including itself) via its methods.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClassStat

      public ClassStat(CPGClass cpgClass, CodePropertyGraph cpg, Helper helper, Map<CPGClass.Attribute,AttributeStat> attributeStats, Map<CPGClass.Method,MethodStat> methodStats)

  • Method Details

    • determineClassUsage

      private static Map<String,Integer> determineClassUsage(CPGClass cpgClass, CodePropertyGraph cpg, Helper helper, Map<CPGClass.Attribute,AttributeStat> attributeStats, Map<CPGClass.Method,MethodStat> methodStats)
      Determine how many times a given CPGClass was used throughout the cpg as an attribute type, parameter type, the destination of an inheritance or realization relationship, the amount of times its attributes and methods were called.

    • returnTotalUsage

      private static int returnTotalUsage(Map<String,Integer> usageMap)
      Iterate through all the key, value pairs of the usageMap to return an integer value representing the total times a given class was used within cpg.
      Parameters:
      usageMap - The map containing a detailed overview of where this class was used
      Returns:
      An integer value representing the total number of times this class was used

    • determineTotalClassLines

      private static Map<String,Integer> determineTotalClassLines(CPGClass cpgClass, CodePropertyGraph cpg)
      Given a CPGClass object, return a map representing the total lines present within that file. Accounting for nested classes and classes that inherit from a superclass.
      Parameters:
      cpgClass - - The class being analyzed
      cpg - - The CodePropertyGraph containing the classes present in the codebase
      Returns:
      An integer value representing the total amount of non-empty lines present within a class.

    • returnTotalClassLines

      private static int returnTotalClassLines(Map<String,Integer> classLineMap)
      Iterate through the key, value pairs of the classLineMap and return an integer value representing the total number of lines present within a class.
      Parameters:
      classLineMap - A map containing an overview of the factors contributing to the total number of lines in a class
      Returns:
      An integer value representing the total number of lines in a class

    • groupAttributesByModifiers

      private static Map<CPGClass.Modifier,List<CPGClass.Attribute>> groupAttributesByModifiers(CPGClass cpgClass)
      Group all the attributes present within a class by 'PUBLIC', 'PRIVATE' and 'PACKAGE PRIVATE' modifiers.
      Parameters:
      cpgClass - The class being analyzed
      Returns:
      A map containing attributes grouped by their modifier

    • groupMethodsByModifiers

      private static Map<CPGClass.Modifier,List<CPGClass.Method>> groupMethodsByModifiers(CPGClass cpgClass)
      Group all the methods present within a class by 'PUBLIC', 'PRIVATE' and 'PACKAGE PRIVATE' modifiers.
      Parameters:
      cpgClass - The class being analyzed
      Returns:
      A map containing methods grouped by their modifiers

    • returnTotalAttributeCalls

      private static int returnTotalAttributeCalls(Map<CPGClass.Attribute,AttributeStat> attributeStats)
      Iterate through the stats of every attribute present within this class and return a total referring to how many times all the attributes belonging to this class were used throughout cpg.
      Parameters:
      attributeStats - A map containing all the attribute stats for attributes belonging to this class
      Returns:
      An integer value representing the total number of times the attributes of this class were used

    • returnTotalMethodCalls

      private static int returnTotalMethodCalls(Map<CPGClass.Method,MethodStat> methodStats)
      Iterate through the stats of every method present within this class and return a total referring to how many times all the methods belonging to this class were used throughout cpg.
      Parameters:
      methodStats - A map containing all the method stats for methods belonging to this class
      Returns:
      An integer value representing the total number of times the methods of this class was used

    • determineTotalClassAttributeCalls

      private static Map<CPGClass,Integer> determineTotalClassAttributeCalls(Map<CPGClass.Method,MethodStat> methodStats)
      Determine the total number of distinct attributes of other classes (including itself) that this class uses throughout its methods.
      Parameters:
      methodStats - A list containing the stats of every method present within a given class
      Returns:
      A map representing how many distinct attributes of another class were used

    • determineTotalClassMethodCalls

      private static Map<CPGClass,Integer> determineTotalClassMethodCalls(Map<CPGClass.Method,MethodStat> methodStats)
      Determine the total number of distinct methods of other classes (including itself) that this class uses throughout its methods.
      Parameters:
      methodStats - A list containing the stats of every method present within a given class
      Returns:
      A map representing how many distinct methods of another class were used
